{-# LINE 1 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
{-# language CPP #-}


{-# LINE 4 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
{-# OPTIONS_HADDOCK hide #-}

{-# LINE 6 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}

module OpenCV.Internal.Core.Types.Mat.Marshal
    ( marshalDepth
    , unmarshalDepth
    , marshalFlags
    , unmarshalFlags
    ) where

import "base" Data.Bits
import "base" Data.Int
import "base" Data.Monoid ( (<>) )
import "this" OpenCV.Internal.Core.Types.Mat.Depth

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------






--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

c'CV_8U = 0
c'CV_8U :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 29 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
c'CV_8S = 1
c'CV_8S :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 30 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
c'CV_16U = 2
c'CV_16U :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 31 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
c'CV_16S = 3
c'CV_16S :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 32 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
c'CV_32S = 4
c'CV_32S :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 33 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
c'CV_32F = 5
c'CV_32F :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 34 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
c'CV_64F = 6
c'CV_64F :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 35 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
c'CV_USRTYPE1 = 7
c'CV_USRTYPE1 :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 36 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}

marshalDepth :: Depth -> Int32
marshalDepth = \case
    Depth_8U       -> c'CV_8U
    Depth_8S       -> c'CV_8S
    Depth_16U      -> c'CV_16U
    Depth_16S      -> c'CV_16S
    Depth_32S      -> c'CV_32S
    Depth_32F      -> c'CV_32F
    Depth_64F      -> c'CV_64F
    Depth_USRTYPE1 -> c'CV_USRTYPE1

unmarshalDepth :: Int32 -> Depth
unmarshalDepth n
    | n == c'CV_8U       = Depth_8U
    | n == c'CV_8S       = Depth_8S
    | n == c'CV_16U      = Depth_16U
    | n == c'CV_16S      = Depth_16S
    | n == c'CV_32S      = Depth_32S
    | n == c'CV_32F      = Depth_32F
    | n == c'CV_64F      = Depth_64F
    | n == c'CV_USRTYPE1 = Depth_USRTYPE1
    | otherwise          = error $ "unknown depth " <> show n

c'CV_CN_SHIFT = 3
c'CV_CN_SHIFT :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 61 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}

marshalFlags
    :: Depth
    -> Int32 -- ^ Number of channels
    -> Int32
marshalFlags depth cn =
    marshalDepth depth
      .|. ((cn - 1) `unsafeShiftL` c'CV_CN_SHIFT)

c'CV_CN_MAX = 512
c'CV_CN_MAX :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 71 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}
c'CV_MAT_DEPTH_MASK = 7
c'CV_MAT_DEPTH_MASK :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 72 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/Types/Mat/Marshal.hsc" #-}

unmarshalFlags :: Int32 -> (Depth, Int32)
unmarshalFlags n =
    ( unmarshalDepth $ n .&. c'CV_MAT_DEPTH_MASK
    , 1 + ((n `unsafeShiftR` c'CV_CN_SHIFT) .&. (c'CV_CN_MAX - 1))
    )
